message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm willing to pay $110 for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. I'm trying to save a bit of money here.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go as low as $108.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $111?
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $109. Can you meet me at that price?
